DESCRIPTION: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
The target takes 15% more damage. The target deals 15% less damage. When target has 8 stacks of #yChill, they gain #yFrozen
The target takes double damage and deals no damage.
The next X times you take unblocked damage, if the damage is less than 6, take half damage instead. Each monster killed increases this threshold by 1 for the rest of your run.
An effect that will be applied go off in two turns.
At the start of your turn, convert HP equal to your Hunger into #yWard. If you start your turn with 5 #yHunger, enter #rBloodlust.
Gain Temporary Hit Points which do not disappear between rounds.
In #yBloodlust Stance, gain [E] . Whenever you deal damage to an enemy, heal 50% of the damage dealt and add a #yStarving to your Discard Pile.
Increase your Drain by your Vitality.
The enemy loses HP equal to your Drain. Heal HP equal to #yDrain and reduce your #yHunger by 1.
Draw X cards from your Discard Pile randomly.
Affects creatures under half their max health.
An entity which deals 2 damage to a random enemy when #ySicced.
Have your #yWolves attack, dealing 2 damage each to a random enemy.
Your #yWolves deal X extra damage.
If you are in #yBloodlust or #yDire #yWolf, gain 4 #yVigor.
Shuffle your Discard Pile back into your Draw Pile.
This effect only triggers if you have four unique buffs.
While in this stance, the first time you would take damage each turn, don't. This stance ends when you take damage or end your turn with no [E] or after 5 turns.

When you enter this stance, gain #yWard equal to half your Max HP. Your attacks deal 25% more damage, and your #yWolves deal 50% damage, however you cannot gain Block. You exit this stance when you run out of #yWard. When you exit this stance, shuffle 5 #yDazed into your Discard Pile.
Remove all #yWolves. Gain 1 Strength for every 2 #yWolves devoured.
This effect only triggers if you have 3 unique debuffs OR if you are holding a #yVoid Status. For the purposes of this effect, #yHunger is a Debuff.
Attacks against this creature deal X more damage.
This card be upgraded again.
Revert this card to its state before it was upgraded.
Must be the second card you play in a turn.
